meanings.definition: A univalent radical, NO2, derived from nitric acid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the properties of nitryl in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Nitryl is commonly found in air pollution.
meanings.sent3: The nitryl radical walked into the bar, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her anger was like a swirling cloud of nitryl, ready to explode.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of nitryl made it easy to identify in the mixture.
